gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: INRA UREP Site de Crouel 5 Chemin de Beaulieu

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The EstrÃ©es-Mons platform is dedicated to field crops. It evaluates the effect of agricultural practices and their interactions on carbon and nitrogen cycles in the soil-plant-water-atmosphere system. Nitrate leaching, evolution of soil organic matter and greenhouse gas emissions (CO2, N2O) are monitored according to the level of nitrogen intensification, export of crop residues, soil tillage, legume frequency and the nature of the rotation. The key issue is to understand how the high variation in carbon and nitrate inputs affects their cycles in more or less intensified systems.
